statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Jalen Jones and Kevin Harvey each scored 20 points and Texas-Arlington pulled away from Arkansas-Little Rock in the second half to win 71-55 on Monday night and seize sole possession of first pla
article.headline: Texas-Arlington takes over 1st place in Sun Belt
article.linkText: Texas-Arlington takes over 1st place in Sun Belt
article.story: ARLINGTON, Texas -- Jalen Jones and Kevin Harvey each scored 20 points and Texas-Arlington pulled away from Arkansas-Little Rock in the second half to win 71-55 on Monday night and seize sole possession of first place in the Sun Belt Conference. The Mavericks (19-6, 9-3) entered the night a half-game behind Arkansas State, Georgia State, and Georgian Southern, all of whom lost on Monday. Both Jones and Harvey finished 7 of 11 from the field. Kaelon Wilson added 13 points for UT-Arlington, who led by just one at halftime and two with 11:35 to go before cruising to the finish. A Jones jumper capped a 10-1 Mavericks run, which extended their lead to double-digits at 57-46. Two free throws by Marcus Johnson Jr. cut the UALR deficit back to seven, but a Harvey 3 extended the gap back to 10. Johnson led the Trojans (13-13, 4-9) with 14 points.
